info.name: ZiraAI Plant Analysis API
info.description: Complete API collection for ZiraAI Plant Analysis system with authentication, authorization, subscription management, and comprehensive sponsorship tier system. Updated v1.4.0 adds full sponsorship enhancement features including 4-tier sponsor profiles, data access control, messaging system, and AI-powered smart linking.
